          <title>
            <string language="en">Summer and winter in the United Kingdom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sommer und Winter im Vereinigten Königreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Été et hiver au Royaume-Uni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Verão e inverno no Reino Unido</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Estate ed inverno nel Regno Unito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλοκαίρι και χειμώνας στο Ηνωμένο Βασίλειο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Verano e invierno en el Reino Unido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows why summer in UK has longer days than nights and while winter has longer nights than days.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">climate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth's revolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth's rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">summer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">United Kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">winter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, warum Sommer in 
Großbritannien längere Tage als Nächte hat und wann Winter längere
Nächte als Tage hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre pourquoi l'été au R-U a de 
plus longues journées que des nuits et tandis que l'hiver a de plus 
longues nuits que des jours.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra porque o verão no Reino 
Unido tem uns dias mais longos do que noites e quando o inverno tem 
umas noites mais longas do que dias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra perchè l'estate nel Regno 
Unito ha giorni più lunghi che le notti e mentre l'inverno ha notti 
più lunghe che i giorni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει γιατί το καλοκαίρι στο 
UK έχει τις μακρύτερες ημέρες από τις νύχτες και ενώ ο 
χειμώνας έχει τις μακρύτερες νύχτες από τις ημέρες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra porqué el verano en Reino 
Unido tiene días más largos que noches y mientras que el invierno 
tiene noches más largas que días.</string>
          </description>
